dcterms:creator: H. Lee
S. H. Jeong
H. K. Kim
dcterms:description: The OTIDS benchmark CAN dataset contains real CAN data collected from a Kia Soul vehicle in normal behavior and during a set of attacks: DoS, Fuzzy, and impersonate. It is the only open dataset with remote frames and responses, making it essential for anomaly identification.
dcterms:title: OTIDS

dcterms:creator: E. Seo
H. M. Song
H. K. Kim
dcterms:description: The Car Hacking dataset contains real CAN data collected from a Hyundai YF Sonata, including baseline data, data files with DoS attacks, Fuzzy attacks, and Spoofing attacks. It is widely used in the CAN IDS literature.
dcterms:title: Car Hacking
